content.en: Autonomous navigation advancements: Researchers have been exploring ways to improve the navigation capabilities of unmanned vehicles such as drones and ground vehicles. They have been investigating the use of algorithms to enhance positioning accuracy and overcome challenges like GPS interruption. These algorithms, such as the Extended Kalman Filter and the Unscented Kalman Filter, are being applied to fuse data from multiple sensors and improve the performance of these autonomous vehicles in various environments.
content.da: Fremskridt inden for autonom navigation: Forskere har undersøgt måder at forbedre navigationskapaciteten for ubemandede køretøjer som droner og jordkøretøjer. De har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer til at forbedre positionsnøjagtighed og overvinde udfordringer som GPS-afbrydelser. Disse algoritmer, såsom den udvidede Kalman-filter og det uskønsne Kalman-filter, anvendes til at flette data fra flere sensorer og forbedre ydeevnen for disse autonome køretøjer i forskellige miljøer.
